analysis.description:
WebcoinCrowdsale.token (/unique_contracts/0x137f0a82473df04cd601b20c9943d89cdd592fd6.sol#736) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (/unique_contracts/0x137f0a82473df04cd601b20c9943d89cdd592fd6.sol#415)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x137f0a82473df04cd601b20c9943d89cdd592fd6.sol#507-511) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x137f0a82473df04cd601b20c9943d89cdd592fd6.sol#511)

WebcoinCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x137f0a82473df04cd601b20c9943d89cdd592fd6.sol#765-767) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x137f0a82473df04cd601b20c9943d89cdd592fd6.sol#766-767)

WebcoinCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_contracts/0x137f0a82473df04cd601b20c9943d89cdd592fd6.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x137f0a82473df04cd601b20c9943d89cdd592fd6.sol)
